meanings.definition: The art or skill of conducting war
meanings.sent1: His knowledge of warcraft helped him lead his army to victory.
meanings.sent2: The general's warcraft was evident in his strategic maneuvers on the battlefield.
meanings.sent3: The children played a game pretending to be knights mastering the art of warcraft.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, negotiation skills are a key part of successful warcraft.
meanings.sent5: The ancient scrolls detailed the secrets of warcraft passed down through generations.

meanings.definition: The equipment, techniques, and strategies used in war
meanings.sent1: The soldiers prepared their warcraft diligently before heading into battle.
meanings.sent2: Modern technology has greatly advanced the tools of warcraft.
meanings.sent3: The chef's kitchen was filled with all the necessary warcraft to create a masterpiece meal.
meanings.sent4: The artist carefully selected his brushes and paints, his tools of creative warcraft.
meanings.sent5: The knight's armor and sword were his trusted warcraft in the face of danger.

meanings.definition: A popular video game franchise involving fantasy battles and strategy
meanings.sent1: Many gamers enjoy spending hours immersed in the world of warcraft.
meanings.sent2: Warcraft enthusiasts eagerly awaited the release of the latest expansion pack.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends gathered online to embark on epic quests in the realm of warcraft.
meanings.sent4: The virtual world of warcraft allowed players to test their strategic skills in battle.
meanings.sent5: The fantasy creatures in warcraft games added an element of magic to the gameplay.
